General.Name: Kamchatskenergo
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Kamchatskenergo engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and sale of electric and thermal energy in Russia. It also offers services for the operation of energy facilities; and undertakes other activities. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Petropavlovsk-Kamchatskiy, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Kamchatskenergo is a subsidiary of PJSC RusHydro.
